text: Year 14 BC was either a common year starting on Thursday or Friday or a leap year starting on Wednesday, Thursday or Friday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Crassus and Lentulus. == Events == * Augsburg is founded by the Roman Emperor Caesar Augustus * Beeroth (modern Beirut) becomes a colonia == Births == * Agrippina the elder, daughter of Marcus Vipsanius Agrippa and Julia the Elder (approximate date) (d. AD 33) * Claudia Pulchra, daughter of Aemilius Lepidus Paullus and Claudia Marcella Minor (d. AD 26) * Ma Yuan, Chinese general of the Han Dynasty (d. AD 49)
title: 14 BC
